OOC: No, it never came to Mexico.

Nightlight::


Nightlight felt horrified when she saw that happened in the Great War 
and how a lot lives had lost in it. She knew why Rodimus had been so 
upset whith Galvatron's trasmission.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:

> OOC: You havn't seen TF:TM?
> 
> We see the battle at Autobot City where several Autobots die. Among 
this is when Rodimus accidently allows Megatron to get the upper hand 
on Optimus Prime.
> 
> Then we see Optimus' death in the Autobot City Med Bay, and Ultra 
Magnus being named Autobot Commander. 
> 
> We then see the City fall under attack by Galvatron and his 
Decepticons. The Autobots flee into space.
> 
> It then shows The battle against Unicron over Cybertron. It doesn't 
show events from within Unicron sauch as Hot Rod becoming Rodimus, 
and his battle with Galvatron.
